verses.text:
\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* of \w Abib|strong="H0024"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for in the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* of \w Abib|strong="H0024"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* brought thee \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

Thou shalt therefore \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* and the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* to \w place|strong="H7931"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there.

Thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no leavened \w bread|strong="H2557"\w* with it; \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* therewith, \add even\add* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*; for thou camest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* in \w haste|strong="H2649"\w*: that thou mayest \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when thou camest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*.

And there shall be no leavened \w bread|strong="H7603"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* with thee in all thy \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; neither shall there \add any thing\add* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, which thou \w sacrificedst|strong="H2076"\w* the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* all night until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

Thou \w mayest|strong="H3201"\w* not \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* within \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee:\f + \fr 16.5 \ft sacrifice: or, kill\f*

But at the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* to \w place|strong="H7931"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* in, there thou shalt \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, at the going \w down|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, at the \w season|strong="H4150"\w* that thou camest \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And thou shalt \w roast|strong="H1310"\w* and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add it\add* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*: and thou shalt \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* unto thy \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*: and on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* no \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add therein\add*.\f + \fr 16.8 \ft solemn…: Heb. restraint\f*

¶ \w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* shalt thou \w number|strong="H5608"\w* unto thee: \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* to \w number|strong="H5608"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* from \add such time as\add* thou \w beginnest|strong="H2490"\w* \add to put\add* the \w sickle|strong="H2770"\w* to the \w corn|strong="H7054"\w*.

And thou shalt \w keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with a \w tribute|strong="H4530"\w* of a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, which thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add unto the \+nd Lord\+nd* thy God\add*, according as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee:  +  r 16.10  t a tribute: or, sufficiency *

And thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou, and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and thy \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, and thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, and the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* that \add is\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, and the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, and the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, that \add are\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* to \w place|strong="H7931"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there.

And thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* that thou wast a \w bondman|strong="H5650"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and thou shalt \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* these \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, after that thou hast \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* in thy \w corn|strong="H1637"\w* and thy \w wine|strong="H3342"\w*:\f + \fr 16.13 \ft corn…: Heb. floor, and thy winepress\f*

And thou shalt \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in thy \w feast|strong="H2282"\w*, thou, and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and thy \w manservant|strong="H5650"\w*, and thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w*, and the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, and the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, that \add are\add* within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou keep a solemn \w feast|strong="H2287"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*: because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in all thine \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*, and in all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, therefore thou shalt surely \w rejoice|strong="H8056"\w*.

¶ \w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* in a \w year|strong="H8141"\w* shall all thy \w males|strong="H2138"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which he shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*; in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, and in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, and in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*: and they shall not \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*:

Every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add shall give\add* as he is \w able|strong="H4979"\w*, according to the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* which he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee.\f + \fr 16.17 \ft as…: Heb. according to the gift of his hand\f*

¶ \w Judges|strong="H8199"\w* and \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee in all thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, throughout thy \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*: and they shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with \w just|strong="H6664"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

Thou shalt not \w wrest|strong="H5186"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*; thou shalt not \w respect|strong="H5234"\w* \w persons|strong="H6440"\w*, neither \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w gift|strong="H7810"\w*: for a \w gift|strong="H7810"\w* doth \w blind|strong="H5786"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and \w pervert|strong="H5557"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*.\f + \fr 16.19 \ft words: or, matters\f*

That which is \w altogether|strong="H6664"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w* shalt thou \w follow|strong="H7291"\w*, that thou mayest \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee.\f + \fr 16.20 \ft That which…: Heb. Justice, justice\f*

¶ Thou shalt not \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* thee a \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* of any \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* near \w unto|strong="H0681"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thee.

Neither shalt thou set thee \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \add any\add* \w image|strong="H4676"\w*; which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w*.\f + \fr 16.22 \ft image: or, statue, or, pillar\f*
